16549.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc> has just trained to

16550.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「き:

master.

16551.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「さ:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Now report to Commander Strong and ask

16552.<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>「緊:
<start_lip_sync n01437 _normal m00001>The story that was announced at the
emergency meeting is true, isn't it? I

16554.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「な:
I knew that I was a member of the "I've been to Japan before, but I didn't realize that this year was the
year.

16555.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「１:
Once in a century, a sacrifice is offered to the dragon of the earth. And Jenya is playing the role of the
sacrificer.

16556.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ジ: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>Jenya is a sacrifice?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16557.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「ど:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>What the hell is going on? I and the
others went to train in special
techniques to protect Jenya!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16558.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「な: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>So why is Jenya a sacrificial victim?<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16559.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>The special move was necessary to get

16561.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><s: <start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001><shake_big>Don't be silly. ~~~~~~!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16562.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「殺:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>What's the point of having them
protect you in order to kill you!<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16563.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>We're palace paladins who will die to
protect you. That's not what this
mission is about.<stop_lip_animation n01436 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16564.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「だ:
But if the dragon of the earth awakens, it will cause a massive earthquake that will threaten to
destroy this continent. There is no other way to put the dragon back to sleep.

16565.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「た:
Are you saying that you are willing to sacrifice Jenya in order to save so many people? I would never approve of
such a thing!

16566.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「え: <start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>It's okay, Zubo.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16567.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>This is what I wanted.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16568.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「あ:
I was born in a poor village deep in the mountains where small children died every day because there was
nothing to eat.

16569.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「み:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>We were trying our best to make ends
meet for everyone, but it wasn't
enough at all for this poor community.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16570.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「そ:
The reason such settlements have not disappeared is because of a promise made to the dragon of the earth long
ago. He promised to dedicate every girl born in the village to him.

16571.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「だ:
That's why I asked King Grossner for money. I'm going to become a sacrifice, so please give me money.
Please give food to everyone in the village.

16572.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「グ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>King Grossner was a very nice man. He
gave me a lot of money! So I have
nothing to worry about anymore.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16573.<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01432 _normal m00001>That's what the money was then? That
big box of money I gave Grandma when I
went to pick up Jenya.<stop_lip_animation n01432 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16574.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>That's right! King Grossner really
doesn't want to sacrifice anyone. But
this can't be helped.<stop_lip_animation n00096 CLOSE_MOUTH>

16575.<start_lip_sync n00096 _normal m00001>「せ:
That's why I'm here. I'm satisfied with this. When the time comes, I want you to take me to the dragon of the
earth.

16577.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「大:
Earthwyrm is an evil dragon with the destructive power of a natural disaster that lies deep underground in
the Ogreed Continent.

16578.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「ひ:
Once awakened, it will cause massive earthquakes and easily submerge this continent into the sea. There is no
way to resist the dragon of the earth.

16579.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>Give it up, Zubo. This is King

16580.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…:

16581.<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n01436 _normal m00001>I hope that you will continue to grow

16585.<start_lip_sync n01438 _normal m00001>「大:
